content.text: If cells and batteries that produce gases and fumes (e.g. lead-acid batteries that produce hydrogen and  oxygen) are to be installed, provision shall be made for the necessary ventilation and recommended  environmental conditions (see HD 60364-5-54). Local regulations shall be complied with.

requirements.text: If cells and batteries that produce gases and fumes (e.g. lead-acid batteries that produce hydrogen and  oxygen) are to be installed, provision shall be made for the necessary ventilation and recommended  environmental conditions (see HD 60364-5-54). Local regulations shall be complied with.
